This static function should be overridden by child classes to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly with the parameters in the string, string map.

All objects created this way should be deleted when finished using.

void PmOnlyAdjust::pmAdjustment ( int  probeIx,
int  chipIx,
const IntensityMart &  iMart,
std::vector< ChipStream * > &  iTrans,
float &  pmIntensity,
float &  bgrdAdjust 
) [inline, virtual]

Function to determine how much to adjust a perfect match intensity.

Parameters:
probeIx - Index of probe in cel file data.
chipIx - Microarray or chip index.
iMart - IntensityMart which holds raw data.
iTrans - Vector of transformations that should be performed on raw data.
pmIintensity - Intensity of perfect match probe to be adjusted, may be modified from original value depending on adjuster
bgrdAdjust - Background adjustment, if any, recommended (i.e. MM intensity)

Implements PmAdjuster.
